package.name: gazebo
package.description: Deprecated package that used to pull a version of Gazebo to build for ROS. Now Gazebo is installed through a stand alone debian.
package.author: Nate Koenig, Andrew Howard, with contributions from many others. See web page for a full credits list.

export.deprecated: This package will be removed in ROS-I. Gazebo is now a stand alone package.
